message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. It's a game-changer, and I think you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better offer anywhere else.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but my budget is limited. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I have to say that $9500 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $11000. This is the lowest I can go, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $10500.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still a bit hesitant to accept $10500, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11200. This is the best I can do, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your efforts to reach a compromise, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $10800.

Thank you for your latest offer, Bob. I'm still not comfortable with the price, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11400. This is the final offer I can make, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on our discussions, I would like to counter with an offer of $11000.

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to reach an agreement, Bob. I've already made significant concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $11200, but that's my absolute limit. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'm afraid I'll have to consider other options.
I understand your position, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to make a final counteroffer of $11100.
